Comments_List: How to correctly write a paper and make everything cohesive and thourough

My academic writing definitely improved throughout this course. We dealt with a variety of writing styles, so I was able to improve my ability to write in multiple styles and for multiple prompts. I definitely learned a lot about photography and its implications for the world we live in and how we live. In general, my writing improved greatly overall.

The requirements of college level essay writing 
How to focus my claim and organize my paper
i learned how to properly support claims and tackle a research paper.
The main skill I learned was how to effectively take information from sources and use/examine it to support my claim.
weaknesses are the readings and lack of writing prep in class, strengths are engagement and small class size

Some weaknesses: The prompts were sometimes confusing, and I did not understand what the professor expected, but he definitely clarifies if you ask him. Some of the readings are not the most exciting and a bit difficult, but I learned a lot from them. 

Some strengths: The professor is very receptive to the students' desires and is always trying to improve the course for his students. He gives you many opportunities to improve your grade and is not an unfair grader. There really were not an overwhelming amount of readings, and he scheduled them in a way that was very manageable.
The professor tries very hard to improve the course consistently
the course information was very interesting and very uninteresting at certain times. the reading load was reasonable but very boring.
In terms of becoming a better writer, this course was effective. My only complaint would be that in the beginning of the year, the material was a little dry.
Yes it teaches you how to correctly make a paper flow and write ideas

I recommend this course for those who have a passion for understanding the implications of photography in our everyday life. I also recommend it for people who want to improve their academic writing skills, but you definitely have to put in the work.
Yes. It taught me about photography
not unless they are interested in the course topic.
Yes, this class improved my writing skills exponentially.
